claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok Quadrivalent (Sanofi Pasteur) 0.5 mL PFS ≥18 yrs 45 µg/0.5 mL IM ... RIV4 (recombinant HA vaccine)
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote identifies Flublok as a recombinant HA vaccine (RIV4), which means it is produced using recombinant technology. This method allows for the production of hemagglutinin antigens that are an exact genetic match to the WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
